name: Dropico Media
overview:
Dropico is a revolutionary free universal photo sharing experience. It lets you overcome traditional online barriers to shoot, edit and share photos easily â€“ straight from your browser or mobile â€“simultaneously posting them over multiple social networks. It also enables you to seamlessly deliver photos to select groups of friends across a range of popular social and messaging channels. Dropico lets you copy, edit and organize your media collection right in your browser, on your iPhone or on your Android smartphone, then share it across any mobile device, IPTV, storage service or social network. It also lets you manipulate and enhance photos using a rich selection of built-in filters, or via third-party photo editing services.

Want to share your treasured moments on Facebook and Flickr? Copy them over between popular social networks? Just drag and drop your photos onto your social network or photo sharing service of choice from your browser. Donâ€™t worry about a thing â€“ Dropico automatically and transparently carries over any tags, titles, descriptions and any other data that applies between different networks and services.
